title: 1 Ridza Tsuri
content:
# 1 Ridza Tsuri

 Ridza tsuri yevangeri, Murindi wanyewera;Avo vanonzwa masoko, Vapinduke, vapone.
CHORUS:Ridzanyi, murindi, ridza, Pasi pese ridzisa;Mwari arikuti, Ridza Vasungwi vaponeswa.
Ridza pamakomo ese Mapomo nemikana;Nepanyanza ridzanyizve, Soko rekuponeswa.
Ridzanyizve pamagwanza, Nenzvimbo dzine dima;Taura zvakagadzirwa, Baba atidayidza.
Ridza kune vakaneta, Vanoda kuponeswa; Muponesi wadayidza, Mwese munodikanwa.

title: 2 Petyo Kana Nepam’suvo
content:
# 2 Petyo Kana Nepam’suwo

 Mambo aripo pam’suwo, Iye wafa pamchinjiko;Asi unowuya zvino Kutora vake’vo.
CHORUS:Pamsuwo, Pam’suwo, Pam’suwo, Hunde’po pam’suwo;Anouya, Anouya, hunde ari pam’suwo.
Zviwoneso zvekuuya, Zvino zviri kuitika;Toona nekukasika Musi wakanaka.
Musanangise pasi’po, Kuti kusine dambudzo;Dakara Muponesi’wo Auye pasi’po.
Ndizvo mupasi’po itsva, Tichagara nekugara;Kufa kuchawa kusafa, Haiperi nguva.

title: 3  Usu Neusu
content:
# 3  Usu Neusu

 Tichazoonana usu, NaTenzi toonana;Ndinodisa kumuona Jesu wakandifira.
CHORUS:Ndichazomuona Tenzi, Iyo mhiri kwedenga;Tichazoonana naYe, Gare gare kumusha.
Nhasi handisi kum’ona, Basi nge kudawira;Asi musi unouya, Jesu uchazoonwa.
Tichafara pamwe naye, Urombo hwazopera;Ne nzira dzaruramiswa, Zvedima zvacheniswa.
Toonana ngerufaro, Kuona nekuziwa;Iye Mununuri wangu, Jesu unondidisa.

title: 4 Arikuuya
content:
# 4 Arikuuya

 Soko rakanaka kunesu vafambi, Apo tinoyenda pasi’po;   Asi Muponesi achazouyazve, Kutonga umambo hwake’wo.
CHORUS:   Arikuuya ngekukasika, Jesu zve arikudzoka,   Nevafambi vake vachazotorwa, Apo Jesu auya.
Makuva ekare apo vanorara, Vafambi vakafa naKristu;   Vachazarurwazve, vanhu vanomuka, Vachapona pamwe na Jesu.
Tichasangana kumusha’wo kudenga, Tichaimba ngekuponeswa;Vaponeswi’wo vachabva pasi rese, Vanamate Mambo wedenga.   
Hariruya, Amen, nezve Hariruya, Ngekudawira, tichasvika;Namata, simbira, kufara, dakara, Topfeka mbiri yekudenga.

title: 5 Kure Senyi Kumusha?
content:
# 5 Kure Senyi Kumusha?

  A kurekure kumusha? Ndabvunza murindi, ati, Usiku hurikupera, Kwakuda kuyedza. Usacheme, kurumidza,   Mutewere, kusimbira;   Muchasvika mukupenya   Hakuna kupera.    
Ndabvunza kune mukani,   Anerwiyo rwekushinga,   Ngekushinga ndinokana,   Hondo ichapera.   Musacheme, mutiwire,Dakara basa rapera,Tinoziva tinechipo,Kuti takurira    
 Ndabvunzazve pasi, zuva,Zvese zvakandipindura;Nguva irikundopera,Jesu anouya.Musacheme, zviwoniso zveZviri kutinyewera,Zvisikwa zvese zvinodaTsuri imborira.    
Tiripatyo nekumusha,Kunofadza kutonderaChifarai imwi vafambi,Bvisanyi’wo kutya.Musacheme, tisanganeApo kusina kuneta,Zviyedzo’zvo zvakapera,Tasvika kumusha

title: 108 Jesu Mufudzi Unodiwa
content:
# 108 Jesu Mufudzi Unodiwa

 Jesu ari Mufudzi, anokudaidzaMukati me-danga’mo kuchine nzvimbo.Uya  kuchinasi uno apo uchimutsva,Pinda muiro danga, danga iro redi.
CHORUSNge rudo Jesu anodaidza, Mfambi zve uya zvino;Ari kundirekerera ini, Jesu Mufudzi wangu.
Jesu ari Mufudzi, wakafira iweAnodaidza zvino, Mfambi uya kuneni;Kunze kune dambuzo, uya unodanwa,Pinda muiro danga, danga iro redi.
Pinda, usanonoke, kunze kune mhumi,Dzinozokukuwadza, dzakapanduka kwazvo.Jesu ari Mufudzi, anokudaidza,Pinda muiro danga, danga iro redi.

title: 109 Wayerwa Unoreruka
content:
# 109 Wayerwa Unoreruka

 Apo m’tongi otiyera, Kana takafaniraTichamira sendarama, Kana senhando here?
CHORUSTichazoyerwa nem’temo TicharerukaTichazoyerwa naTenzi Tichareruka
Tonzwa mazwi erufa-ro: "Waita zvakanaka!"Kana mazwi anotyisa; "Hauna kukwanira?"
Ngatinzwe mweya mutsvene Apo tichada mutsa,Kana tanonoka Mwa-ri, Anounza magumo?

title: 110 Wakakomborerwa Awo Wanoita
content:
# 110 Wakakomborerwa Awo Wanoita

 Inzwa mazwi aMuponesi Ndiwo mazwi eupenyu.Inzwa utondere Jesu akati, "Vakomborerwa vaiti."
CHORUSVakakomborerwa vakarurama, komborerwa, komborerwa,Vakakomborerwa vano’ta  m’temo komborerwa, komborerwa.
Hakutibatsiri kunzwa kwedu mitemo nezvitsidzo;Kuzvinzwa, kuzviita hakuponesi; Vakomborerwa vanoita.
Vanozopinda mumusha vakasunungurwa zviitemaVasukwa, nembiri, zvino narini, Vanodya muti veupenyu.

title: 111 Hakuna Mumwe
content:
# 111 Hakuna Mumwe

 Hakuna hama kupinda Jesu, Hakuna, neimwe!Hakuna umwe kurapa vese, Hakuna, neumwe!
CHORUSAnoziva nanhamo Jesu, Anotungamira tese,Hakuna umwe kupinda Jesu, Hakuna!neumwe.
Hakuna umwe mukuruzveba, Hakuna ne-umwe!Asi Anozviita muduku, Hakuna neumwe!>
Hakuna nguva asipo Iye, Hakuna neimwe:Kana usiku rudo ruripo, Hakuna neimwe.
Hakuna umwe akamborambwa, Hakuna neimwe! neumwe!Kana munyangadzi ha’murambi, Hakuna!neumwe!
Hakuna chipo chikuruzveba, Hakuna nechimwe!Hangatinyimi musha kudenga, Hakuna neumwe!

title: 112 Upenyu Mukutarisa
content:
# 112 Upenyu Mukutarisa

 Pamuchinjiko pane upenyu, Jesu Ati, "Nditarise."Pasi nepfuma ngezvenhando, Pamberi ndoona zvakanaka.
CHORUSMune u-penyu muku-tarisa muchinjiko.(Upenyu m’kutarisa pam’chinjiko vaKristu,)Upenyu hwakanaka kutarisa Kalvari(Upenyu hwakanaka tarisa paKalvari, pakalvari.)
Apo ndakamutarisa Jesu, Iye Akanyemwerera,Kuti ndava mumatambudzo, Muchinjiko unondisimbisa.
Ndinozotarisa muchinjiko, Ndosimbira muchinjiko;Hakuna anozoputsika Vanosimbira simba redenga.

title: 113 Achidaidza
content:
# 113 Achidaidza

 Jesu arikudanira kumusha, kudana iwe neni,Arindira pamusiwo nemwoyo, Rindira iwe neni.
CHORUSUya kum’sha, Imi maneta uya.(Uya) (Kum’sha)Jesu arikumudaidza kwazvo, O munyangadzi uya
Musanonoke achimudaidza Kunyengerera imwi,Ngenyiko tisinganzwi mutsa wake, Mutsa kunewe Nemi.
Nguwa irikukasika kupfu’ra Kupfu’ra iwe neni,Bvute, nedima, rufaro zvouya Uya kunewe neni
Funga ngerudo akatitsidzira Tsidzira iwe neniKana takatadza \‘nosunungura, Osunungura tese.

title: 114 Zambara Razarurirwa Ini
content:
# 114 Zambara Razarurirwa Ini 

 Zambara rakazarurwa Kuti ini ndipinde;Muchinjiko waM’ponesi Tichauona apo.    
CHORUSMutsa wakadzama kwazvo kuti andizarurire,Ini...ini...Rasiyirwa ini.(Ini) (ini.)    
Zambara rakazarurwa Kuti vese vapone.Vapfumi kana varombo, madzinza kana ndudzi.    
Pamberi ngatifambenyi, richakandozarurwa,Gashiranyi rudo Rwake, Chiremba nem’chinjiko.    
Hunde mhiriyo kwerwizi Totura muchinjikoTotakura ‘cho-chiremba Toda Mwari kudenga.

title: 115 Murapi Mukuru
content:
# 115 Murapi Mukuru

 Murapi m’kuru uripo we mutsa, ndiye Jesu.Anofarisa warombo, Inzwai izvi raJesu.
CHORUSZita Rake ritendzwe, Zita rake rikudzweZita Rake riimbwe; Jesu hunde Jesu
"Zwitadzo zwa sunungurwa" Inzwai izwi raJesu.Fambanyi naYe kudenga, Tigere’ko naJesu.
Mbiri kuNyenye yaMwari, Ndinodawira Jesu, Ndinodisa zita iri raMuponesi Jesu.
Zwimwe ndatadza ndinoda Kunzwa zita ra Jesu,Mwoyo wangu wanyaradzwa Ngezita’ro ra Jesu.
Apo iye achauya nembiri ne upenyu,Tichafara kutaura ruponeso rwaJesu.

title: 116 Hamuna Nzvimbo YaJesu
content:
# 116 Hamuna Nzvimbo YaJesu

 Uzerea ne kunetswa, Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?Wabatwa nemirau, Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?O, Amire pamusiwo, O gugudza-gugudza!Munzwe onyengerera Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?
Unopambadza nguwa, Hana basa ra Jesu?Usapambadza Simba, Ha’na basa raJesu?Hauyedzi kukunda, Kana kuwana Mweya;Daidza warasika; Ha’na basa raJesu?
Unotswaka upfumi, Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?Usinga bati basa, Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?Rufaro ne upfumi, Ndizvo zviro unoda,Kuyedza kuzvifadza; Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?
Watakura zvenhando, Ha’na m’chero va Jesu?Haunaba misumbu, Ha’na m’chero va Jesu?Hauna kana chiro, kuripa basa rako;Hauwani rufaro, Wokumbana na Jesu?

title: 117 Ndirikuuya Tenzi
content:
# 117 Ndirikuuya Tenzi

 Ndanzwa izwi renyu, Randidana Tenzi;Ndigeze neropa renyu, RepaKalvari,
CHORUSNdouya Tenzi! Uya kunemwi;Ndigezei neropa, RepaKalvari.
Handina masimba, Munondisimbisa;Mondigezisa ndichene, Ndichene sechero,
Jesu ondidaidza, kune runyararo,Kurudo nerusimbiro, rwepasi nedenga.
Rukudzo muropa, Kudzai tsitsi dzake,Kudzai Chipo cha Tenzi, Arisimba Redu.

title: 118 Jesu Akaripa Zwese
content:
# 118 Jesu Akaripa Zwese

 Muponesi ati, "Hauna masimba,"Rinda unamate, Ndinokupa zvese.
CHORUSJesu M’nunuri, zvese ngezwake,Zvitema zvakatsvuka "zwachena Sechero"
Tenzi ndazoona Munesimba rese,Munobvisa hosha ne mwoyo we dombo.
Handina kunaka kungadiwa tsitsi,Nguwo ya-ngu ndogeza muropa renyenye.
Pachigaro chenyu ndichamiranemi,Ndicha isa zwese pamakumbo Ake.

title: 119 Nanda Rinochenisa
content:
# 119 Nanda Rinochenisa

 Ndinoona nanda dzvuku Tsime rakadzama,Jesu Tenzi Muponesi Wakatifirayo.
CHORUSTsime iro ndoriwona Iro rinondichenesa;Kudza Tenzi! Rochenesa, Kudza Tenzi rochenesa.
Nda wona upenyu hutswa Ndanzwa ropa Rake;Zwitema zwese zwapera Apo patsimero.
Ndamuka ndaitwa mutswa Nembiri yedenga;Ne mwoyo nenguwo chenaa Na Kristu mandiri
Chishamiso tsitsi dzake, Ropa Rake pasi;Muziwenyi Jesu chete wakati nunura.

title: 120 Ndinodayira
content:
# 120 Ndinodayira

 Baba ndouya kwamuri; Hakuna umwezwe!Kuti mandisiya ndeda; O ndinoendepi.
CHORUSNdodaira iye zvino, Jesu wandifira,Ropa Rake raparara, kuchenesa ini.
Mwana wenyu ndom’daira, ndinzwe simba renyu,Zvidiso zvangu zvazadzwa, mune ino nguva.
Muvambi verudairo, Ndotarisa imwi,Ndogashira chipo chenyu; Ndiponeswe nacho.

title: 121 Ndichaimba Ne Rudo RwaJesu
content:
# 121 Ndichaimba Ne Rudo RwaJesu

 Ndicha i...mbira Jesu Iye wa...kandidisa  (Ndicha-i...)     (Iye wa...)Akari...siyadenga Akafa pa Kari-va-ri  (Akari...)     
 CHORUSNdoimba...rudo rwaJesu, Ndomuku...dzanarini  (Ndoimba...)       (Ndomuku...)Wakandi...fira ini Ndoimba rudo rwake  (Wakandi...)     
Ndisati...ndachema Jesu aka...ndichemera  (Ndisati     Suaka)Ndisati...ndanamata Akandi namatira  (Ndisati)     
Okudza...makwerudo Hakuzi...kanwikwese  (Okudza...)	     (Hakuzi...)Kutizwi...tema zvangu Zvacheneswa sechero  (Kutizwi)     
Handina...rudo rwaJesu Ndomuku...dza narini  (Handina)   (koaka)Tenzi mwo...yo waneta Ndizadzeyi nerudo  (Tenzimwo)

title: 122 Petyo, Kune Mwi Tenzi
content:
# 122 Petyo, Kune Mwi Tenzi

 Petyo, Petyo, ne mwoyo venyu, Ndiswendedze imwi munokoshaNdifungatireyi paditi, Ndiyige muninga, yezororo,Ndiyige "Muninga, yezororo."
Petyo, Petyo, handina chiro chemupiro kuna Jesu mambo;Chete mwoyo unechitema, Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu;Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu.
Petyo, Petyo, zve kuva wenyu, Ndino siya zvese zvechitemaRufaro rwacho, nekuzvida, Ndipenyi JesuAkarowerwa, Ndipenyi Jesu akarowerwa
Petyo, Petyo, ndichikupona, Dakara ndiswike m’mbiriYenyu, Ndinozowa wenyu narini,Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi,Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi

title: 123 Rita Rinoyera
content:
# 123 Rita Rinoyera

 Zita rakanakisisa, rinopfuura ese,Rakapiwa naye Baba, Kumu Rubgwana Wake.    
CHORUSIro rinoyera; Zita rinoyera (Royera!)(Royera!)Rabva kuna Baba, Ra’ya pasiRauya ne ngirosi; Ra’ya pausiku (Royera) (Royera)Zita ra Tenzi Jesu.    
Rounza chikomborero, Ndoimba ndichifara,Zita Rake ndoribvuma, Ndichazoriparidza.    
Nyaya yerusununguro nerudo ndichaimbaNdichazo rikudza zita rinopfuura ese.

title: 124 Kwete Ini Asi Kristu
content:
# 124 Kwete Ini Asi Kristu

 Kwete ini Asi kudzai Kristu;Asi Kristu Azihwe akudzwe:Kristu chete mubasa redu rese;Kristu basi mukufunga kwese.
Kwete ini Anonyaradza,NdiKri-stu A-nobvisa masodzi;NdiKri-stu A-nosimudza mutoro;Ndiye Kristu Anodzinga kutya;
Kristu basi ha’tauri zwenhando;Kristu basi Asina nyongano:Kristu basi Asingazwi kudzi ba;Kristu basi Ini ndisa onwe.
Handi-ni-ndi Kristu A ndipa zwese;Handini ndi-Kristu \‘andipa simba;Kristu chete Asimbisa muwiri,Kristu chete, Dakara narini.

title: 125 Kujeka Mumwoyo
content:
# 125 Kujeka Mumwoyo

 Kune kupenya mugomo, nekupenya munyanza,Nemaranzi anogara Munzwimbo dzakanaka,Mukati memwoyo wangu mazadzwa nekujeka,Apo pana Muponesi pano jekesa kwese.    
CHORUSO! kupenya kwakanaka kupenyera mu mwoyo,Jesu ano bvisa nhamo anopenya mumwoyo.    
Ndosiya kusuwa kwangu Senguwadzo dzekare;Ndifukidze nekutenda mundipenyikutenda.Kumusha wembiri uyo makandigadzirira;Mwoyo wangu unotenda ne mweya unobvuma.    
Muponesi manditenga ndawawenyu narini;Ngayipfute mwenje yese ipfutire iye Tenzi.Kumusha wembiri uyo makandigadzirira;Mwoyo wangu uno tenda nemweya unobvuma.

title: 126 Sezwo Ndaponeswa
content:
# 126 Sezwo Ndaponeswa

 Ndine ngoma yandinoda sezwo ndaponeswa;Yamununuri naMambo Sezwo ndaponeswa.    
CHORUSSezwo-ndaponeswa, Sezwo ndaponeswaNdokudza Muponesi, Sezwo ndaponeswa,Ndokudza zita raM’ponesi    
Ndina Kristu Oyerisa sezwo ndaponeswa.Rudo rwake ndurudisa sezwo ndaponeswa.    
Ndine mbowo yakanaka sezwo ndaponeswa.Anodzinga kutya kwese Sezwo ndaponeswa.    
Andi gadzirira musha sezwo ndaponeswa,Kwandicha gara narini sezwo ndaponeswa.

title: 127 Anoda Zwe Ini
content:
# 127 Anoda Zwe Ini

 Mwari avona kashiri kaputsika pasi;Kuti achida kashiri Anodazve ini.    
CHORUSAnondida, anondida, anondida ini,Anoda zviduku zvese, anodazve ini.    
Anogadzira maruva akanaka kwazvo;Kuti anoda maruva anodazve ini.    
Mwari wakasika zvese, shiri ne maruva,Haachakanganwi tupwere, Twese anotuda.

title: 128 Yakakomborerwa Nguwa Yemunamato
content:
# 128 Yakakomborerwa Nguwa Yemunamato

 Nguwa yekunamata mwoyo uno pfawaTouya kuna Jesu M’ponesi weduNekutenda touya, Kuchishangu cheduOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo    
CHORUSMukunamata TinokomborerwaOrapa wakaneta Zvakanaka kuwayo.    
Nguwa yekunamata, Tenzi oswederaAne tsitsi kunzwa vana vachichemaZvese tinozviisa pamakumbo akeOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo    
Nguwa yekunamata, apo vano yedzwaToisa kuna Tenzi anobatsiraNemwoyo wekunzwira obvisa zvinetsoOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo.    
Panguwa yem’namato TinomusimbiraZwikomborero zwese tinozwiwana;Mukusimbira iye hakuna dambudzoOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo.

title: 129 Jesu Huya Utikomborere
content:
# 129 Jesu Huya Utikomborere

 Jesu imi mati "Pakaungana, Wawiri, watatu, munozowapo"Tinomudaira, Tomunamata; Jesu uyai muzotikomborera.
CHORUSJesu u-ya uzo tikombo-rere Je-su kombo-rera, Ugare petyo.
Je-su makasangana nesu kare Asi iwa ne-su nekumagumoUya Muponesi, mutipe tsitsi; Tenzi tigashire; tino namata.
Ita mazwi edu amuimbire Inzwa zvikumbiro zvedu kunemwi;Simbisa rudairo rwedu kunemwi, Chenesai rudo nzira ijeke.

title: 130 ’Ndiri Wenyu Tenzi’
content:
# 130 ’Ndiri Wenyu Tenzi’

 Ndiri wenyu Tenzi, Ndanzwa Izwi, Rataura nerudo,Ndinoda kusimba murudairo. Ndiwe petyo nemwi.    
CHORUSNdipfuwe-nyi Petyo naTenzi: (Pe-tyo pe-tyo)Petyo nemuchinjiko. Ndipfuwenyi ndiwePetyo naTenzi, Petyo nedivi renyu.    
Ndipirenyi kubasaro renyu, nesimbaro retsitsiMweya wangu utarise imwi, nerudo ruwe rwenyu.    
Ndine rufaro Tenzi panguva ndiri-pamberi penyu,Ndichipfugama nemwizve Mwari Tichitaurirana.    
Kune rudo rwondisingazivi, Dakara ndiswikeko;Rufaro rwo-ndisingasvikiri, Dakara ndiwe nemwi.

title: 131 Ndifanane NaJesu
content:
# 131 Ndifanane NaJesu

  Ngandifane naJesuAve Mponesi wanguNdizadzenyi nerudoNdipfawire senjiwaNgandifambe saJesuMurwendo rweripasiNdiri murombo m’mweyoGarai neni Mponesi    
 Kana achinzwa shiriDzimwe dzichiputsika Adzi itire mutsaNgeidi anondinzwa woAnonditungamirira Nekundiregerera Ngandi itwe mutsweneGarai neni M’ponesi    
Ngandifane naJesuMukurarama kwanguNdizorore kunemwiPanzwimbo inyerereNdibarwe patsva iniNerudo rwake JesuNgandiwe nerutendoGarai neni M’ponesi

title: 132 Petyo Ne Muchinjiko
content:
# 132 Petyo Ne Muchinjiko

 Petyo nemuchinjikoPane tsime kwaroMvura yekurapaYabva kuna Jesu    
CHORUSPetyo, Petyo nem’chinjiko wenyuNdipo panozororaMwoyo wangu wese    
 Petyo nemuchinjikoMutsa wandiwanaApo ndajekeserwaKupenya kwaJesu    
 Petyo nemuchinjikoNdonuona Jesu   Ndibatsire kufamba Mumabvute awo    
Petyo nemuchinjikoNdorinda ndowimbaDakara ndizoswikaMhiriyo kwerizi

title: 133 Kufamba NaMwari
content:
# 133 Kufamba NaMwari

 O bvumai ndifambe nemwiSezvakaita InokiMubate ruwoko rwangu Nditaurirane nemwiKana nzira yoshayikwa Ndibvumei ndifambe nemwi    
Handingambo fambi ndega Dutu ririkuvuvutaMirawu yakateiwa Wawengi wanondi yedzaEse aya matambudzo Tenzi bvumai ndifambe nemi    
 Kuti mandipa zororoZvepasi zvinova nhandoNdozofamba neku-shingaNdotakura muchinjikoDakara ndione ZioniTenzi bvumai ndifambe nemi

title: 134 Rudo Runoshamisa Rwa Jesu
content:
# 134 Rudo Runoshamisa Rwa Jesu

  Panzwimbo yakakwiriraMwoyo wangu unotendaNdiyani angatsananguraNeurwu rudo rwaJesu    
CHORUSRwoshamisa, Rwoshamisa, Ururudo rwaJesuRunotishamisa isu, Ururudo rwaJesu    
Rufaro pamasikatiNerujeko panedimaMushonga mudambudzo Irwo rudo rwo rwaJesu    
Tariro yesununguroMubatsiri ndaputsikaMuupenyu nemukufaNdirwo uru rudo rwaJesu

title: 135 Ndinomuda Kwazvo
content:
# 135 Ndinomuda Kwazvo

  Ndinomuda kwazvoTenzi kune zviro zveseMakandipa runyararoRusingaparadzwi   
 CHORUSHazvisati zvataurwa, Zverudo rukuruHazvisati zvataurwa, Ropa racheniswa   
 Ndinoziva muripetyoKunepasi rino Ndofunga imwi cheteKune ipi ngoma   
Imwi mandisununguraNgandifarisiseNdisinaba rudo rwenyu Ini ndinga tsamwa   
Tenzi wangu anokoshaNdomuitirenyiKuti nzira yakanakaNdozofamba nemwi

title: 136 Ndotondera Kalvari
content:
# 136 Ndotondera Kalvari

  Ndomutewera kwesekoNdadzidza kumusimbiraNdotondera kundifiraPam’chinjiko we Kalvari   
CHORUSJesu anditungamira, M’rwendo rweseNguva dzese, Ari shamwari yeidiNdinotondera Kalvari   
 Ndofarira m’temo wakeNdoda anditungamireRudo rwake rwakanakaRwayerera paKalvari   
 Ndinofamba ndisingatyiNdofara naKristu petyoNdosimbira ndichaonaShamwari ye paKalvari

title: 137 Tora Hako Pasi
content:
# 137 Tora Hako Pasi

 Ungatore hako pasiNerufaro rwaro rweseAsi ndipe hangu JesuAnogara narini   
CHORUSTsitsi dzake dzakadzama, Nerudorwo rukuruRununuro rwakakomba, Chitsidzo che upenyu   
 Ungatora hako pasiUndipe hangu JesuAnondi nyaradza mweyaNaya ndinozoimba   
Ungatora hako pasiUndipe hangu Jesu Ndione kufara kwakeKondifadza munzira   
 Ungatora hako pasiUndipe hangu JesuNdinosimbira m’chinjikoDakara ndimuone

title: 138 Kuzvipira Kuna Jesu
content:
# 138 Kuzvipira Kuna Jesu

 Tora upenyu hwanguHuzvipire kunemwiTora mawoko anguAyite rudo rwako   
CHORUSNdisambe ngeropa reNyenyeNdasambwa, ndachena secheroTenzi ndomupa upenyu nezveseNdiwe wenyu narini   
Tora makumbo anguAmuitore basa Tora izwi ndiimbeKunemwi nguva dzose   
 Tora muromo wangu Uta’re soko renyuTora upfumi hwanguNdisasare nechiro   
Tora nguva dzanguDzimukudze nariniToranyi pfungwa dzanguMudziitise basa   
Tora zvidiso zvanguZviite zviwe zvenyuToranyi mwoyo wanguUwe chigaro chenyu   
 Toranyi rudo rwanguTenzi ndinozvi piraTora huini hwanguHuwe hwenyu narini

title: 139 Ndawana Shamwari
content:
# 139 Ndawana Shamwari

  Ndawana shamwariYakandida ndisingaziviAkandipfuwa nerudoAkandisunga kwa’riMwoyo wangu wasungwaNepfundo-ro rakasimbaJesu ndiri wako iniUriwangu narini   
   Ndawana shamwari\‘Yoshamwari yakandifiraHandi upenyuba cheteAsi akazvipiraZwe ndinazvo handizvanguNdakamuchengeteraMwoyo, simba, upenyu zveseNgezvake narini   
 Ndawana shamwariAkapiwa masimba eseKundichengeta munziraInoyenda kudengaMbiri iri kupenyayoKuti indisimbiseNgandirinde ndisewenzePamberi ndozorora   
 Ndawana shamwariInemutsa idi nerudoNdimutungamiri kwaye Anenzero nesimba Kuna iye anondidaNdinowana masimbaKorufo rungakurira?Ndiri wenyu narini

title: 140 Izwi Ra Jesu
content:
# 140 Izwi Ra Jesu

 Ndanzwa izwi  Jesu Ati Uya uzorore Iwe waneta    Urarepo paditi panguNdauya ndaneta     Ini Tenzi ndakasuwaNdawana zororo   Rino-fadza kuna iye      
   Ndanzwa izwi   Jesu Ati, Ona ndinokupa Chimwa mvura yeupenyu    Kuti urarame  Ndauya ndamwa kunaIyeMvura yeupenyu  Nyota yapera ndaponaKuna’ye M’ponesi      
Ndanzwa izwi,  Jesu Ati, ndini mwenje wenyu Nditarise kwakuyedza  NdichakupenyeraNdawona nyenyedzi Nemwedzi kuna Jesu Ndichafara mukujeka Ndipedzise rwendo

title: 141 Ndiri Wenyu
content:
# 141 Ndiri Wenyu

 Ndinoda kuwawenyuTenzi ndidzidzisenyizveNdoita rudo rwenyuTenzi Ndibatsirenyi
 CHORUSNdiriwe…nyu Tenzi,Ngeidi ndiri wenyuNdinotsi…dza Tenzi,Tenzi ndiri wenyu’di    
Chinyi rufaro neupfumiImwi musipozveNdinosiya zvese zvepasiNdiwane zvenyu    
Ndosiya rufaro rwenyikaUyanyi kuneniNdinozoperera kunemwiMundinyaradze

title: 142 Kunakayi!
content:
# 142 Kunakayi!

 Zuva rakanakisa Rakapinda eseTotorasa pfungwa dzenyikaTofunga naMwari
Mazwi erudo akanakaKubva kuna IyeKu’nza masodzi enhamoOt’svitsa kudenga
Kuti tidzinge zvitemaTayedza tatadzaIye anoona mwoyoAnotibatsira

title: 143 Tenzi Tipatsanisenyi Ne Chikomborero Chenyu
content:
# 143 Tenzi Tipatsanisenyi Ne Chikomborero Chenyu

 Tenzi tipatsanisenyiNechikomborero zveTipe rufaro nefaroTikurire netsitsiOtipenyi masimbawoTichafamba mugwenga    
Tomutenda nekukudzaNeinzwi revhangeriMichero yeinzwi renyuIzadze mwoyo yeduTivimbike nguva dzeseTiwanikwe muidi    
Achakavanda mazuvaNgati ape kwa MuriNgatishinge misi yeseTitize tisaneteKudakare tigoonaMbiri yenyu kudenga

title: 144 Panzwimbo yakakwirira
content:
# 144 Panzwimbo yakakwirira

 Ndiri kukwira munziraYekudenga misi yeseNdichi namata munziraTenzi ndikwidzei kudenga

content:
# 222 Kuchengetwa Mumaoko AJesu 

 Ndachengetwa na Jesu, pachipfuwa chake,Rudo rwakaparadzwa, Mweya wozorora,Tereranyi ngirosi, Dzoimba kwandiri,Mumundawo wembiri, Munyanza inokosha.

Mugwenga nditungamire, Ndipe mana yekudenga,Ndinomuda nguva dzese, Ndichimutevera munzira.    
Ndipinzei mumwoyo menyu, Ndigumbatirenyi Tenzi, Netsitsi ndisimudzeyi, Ndichikutevera munzira.

# 225 Mira Se Gamba

  MuKristu muka! Tenzi akutuma; Nenhowo nemu-nondo mumaoko, Enda, sangana nemuedzi shinga, Mira segamba, utarise mhandu.
CHORUSIwa gamba, Iwa gamba, Iwa gamba,Utarise mhandu.
Kana mungozi, chenjera ngwarira,Usadzokere, Hakuna chishangu;Wakani wedima, Ungawakunde,Mira segamba, utarise mhandu.
Basa raTenzi dziwira nesimba;Rinda udise, urwe kumagumo;Kwa anokutuma, enda kasika,Mira segamba utarise mhandu.
Enda usatye, tenzi ari petyo,Anopa tsitsi, nekukunyaradza;Rudo rwake sekarwizi mugwenga;Mira segamba, utarise mhandu.

 Mwoyo uneurombo, Mazis’ eubofuKuda’ra kunofadza, Jesu ane mwenje     
CHORUSUyayi o muno remerwaNemitoro’yo ndinomupa zororoTorayi jokwe, mudzidze neni nekutiNdakapfava m’mwoyo, Muwane zororo remweya     
 Rufaro’rwo rwenyika, HarumbotigutsiRudo rune rufaro,  Nekuti harufi     
 Kristu anotipa, Kunyaradza kwedengaIwe wasara here? Pinduka upone     
 Runyararo nerudo, Rwake zvakadzamaJokwe rake inyore, Inyore narini

title: 280 Mambo Wedu
content:
# 280 Mambo Wedu

 Ngoma dzakanakisa, Nemusi mutsveneTinotenda M’ponesi, Upenyu nenzira     
CHORUSTenda, Tenda, Muponesi weduTenda, Tenda, Tenda mambo wedu     
 Waidisa vapwere, Apo ari pasiKana ari kudenga, Achirukutida     
 Tinoda kumukudza, Nekunzwa nenyayaDzake achirimo, MuGarire rekare     
 O Tenzi muponesi,  TomupfugamiraKuti muti batsire, Kuponera imwi

title: 281 Inopenya Iye Zvino
content:
# 281 Inopenya Iye Zvino

  Nyenyedzi yakabud’ usiku,  Yakapenya nembiri huruYakatungamira vazivi ,  Kuna M’ponesi kudanga     
 CHORUSInopenya, iye zvino, Ichikupenya nyenyedzi!Inopenya, iye zvino, Yeruponeso, nyenyedzi     
 Vakaziviswa nenzvi redi, M’nguva yeiyi nyeredzi;Vakateera nyenyedziyo, Yayipenya iri Kristu     
 Tinoiteera sevakare, Mwenje wenyika wataurwa;Tinoteera mwenje wayo, Dakara tisvike kudenga

title: 282 Inzwa Mazwi Aterere
content:
# 282 Inzwa Mazwi Aterere

  Inzva manzvi aterere, Anoimbwa kudengaJesu anotonga pasi Denga rose rofaraAgerepo pachigaro, Jesu otonga pasiHariruya! Hariruya! Hariruya! Amen     
 Mambo otonga narini, Ngaatonge narini Hakun’ acham’patsanisa, Neawo makanembaZvisikwa zvetsitsi dzenyu, Zvamirira kum’onaHariruya! Hariruya! Hariruya! Amen     
Kasikayi muponesi, Unzayi zuva renyuKuti mhere yozoridzwa,  Pasi rinozopfu’raTochiimba nemarimba,  Mbiri kuna mambo weduHariruya! Hariruya!  Hariruya! Amen

title: 283 Mumwe Achapinda Ne Mazambara
content:
# 283 Mumwe Achapinda Ne Mazambara

  Mumw’ achapinda nezambara, Gare, gare, gare, gareKune mbiri yandamirira, Ndiwe here, Ndini here?Mumwe \‘chafamba pandarama, Kune miono yakanakaTodya rufaro rwataurwa, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?     
 Mumw’ achatura muchinjiko, Gare, gare, gare, gareVamwe vachapiwa ndarama,  Ndiwe here? Ndini here?Mumwe achazoona mambo, Matambudziko azoperaOzofara naye narini, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?     
Mumw’ achapfigirwa musiwo, Gare, gare, gare, gareInzvi roti handikuzivi, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?Mumwe achadana, haanzvikwi, Otambura m’siwo wapfigwaMumwe oshaya mubairo, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?     
 Mumw’ anoimba rukuriro, Gare, gare, gare, gareTomukudza nevaponeswa,  Ndiwe here? Ndini here?Mumwe achazochingamidza, Vadiwa vepasi rapfuuraTozova mumbiri narini,  Ndiwe here? Ndini here?

title: 284 Mazuva Opfuura
content:
# 284 Mazuva Opfuura

 Kune mwoyo asurukirwa, mazuva opfuuraKane mwoyo yakaneta, mazuva opfuuraKana tichingafara, tiri murwendo rweduTiite zvakanaka, mazuva opfuura     
CHORUSOpfu’ra, opfu’ra, opfu’ra, opfu’raTiite zvakanaka, mazuva opfu’ra     
Hakuchina kutukana, mazuva opfuura Reg’ usu hwako hwupenye, mazuva opfuuraPasi rineurombo, rizere nekuchema Simudza vaputsika, mazuva opfuura     
  Mapfundo ese erudo, mazuva opfuuraToasiya mumasure, mazuva opfuuraMbeu’dzo tinodya, Dzinovamba kukuraDzojekesa mumwoyo, mazuva opfuura

title: 285 Kune Nzvimbo Yakanaka
content:
# 285 Kune Nzvimbo Yakanaka

  Kune nzvimbo yakanaka, Petyo pana BabaNzvimbo isina chitema , Petyo kuna Baba     
CHORUSO Jesu Mununuri, makatuma pasiMutisvededze isu, petyo kuna Baba     
Kune nzvimbo yerufaro, Petyo kuna BabaApo takumbana Naye, Petyo kuna Baba     
Kune nzvimbo yezororo, Petyo kuna BabaNzvimbo iyo yerufaro, Petyo kuna Baba

title: 286 O Nditakure
content:
# 286 O Nditakure

  Ndoona rini’ko musi, Apo vaponeswa Vaswika ZioniMusha werufaro kwazvo     
CHORUSO nditakure, nditakure, kuZioniO chinditakura kuguta’ro revatsvene     
 O ndichanzva Hariruya, Rwoimbwa nechitaNerufaro chichaimba, Rwiyo rwenunuro     
  Onayi mbiri yosvika, Iyo m’fambi anodaInonyaradza vachemi, Rufaro rwosvika

title: 287 Mukuyedzwa Jesu
content:
# 287 Mukuyedzwa Jesu

 Mukuyedzwa, Jesu ndimirireyiTenzi kuti ini, ndisamusiyeKuti ndotenheka, nditsiureyiMusandibvumire, kuputsikazve     
 Pasi nerufaro, RwakarambidzwaNeupfumi hwaro, Zvisandi ku’adzaMugonditondedza neGetsimaniKana muchinjiko, weKarivari     
 Kana ’mi maunza, urombo, nhamoKana ndirwadziwe, munzira pasiBvumira ndione, r’woko rwenyuBvumirayi kuti ndimusimbire

title: 288 Wakaunza Zvipo Kuna jesu
content:
# 288 Wakaunza Zvipo Kuna jesu

   Vaunza kuna Jesu, zvipo zvavo zveseRudo kuna M’ponesi, Rwaita vamupeManzvi ese emutsa, kubatsira vamweZvese-zvo zvipo zvavo akazvigashira     
 CHORUSWaunza kuna Jesu, chipo chakanaka!Ita, Ndamupa mwoyo, pamakumbo ako     
 Pakange pane m’fambi, ayidawo kupaAkaonawo zvipo, zvo vaipa TenziAyidisa zvikuru kuti ape chipoAkamirawo petyo asina nechiro     
 Achema ati, Tenzi ndimwi mune mutsaTora zvese, ndinazvo, nemwoyo wechiviJesu akapindura, Chikuru chipo chakoKupinda zvimwe zvese, zvaunzwa kuneni

title: 289 Nditoreyi Ini
content:
# 289 Nditoreyi Ini

  Jesu Tenzi ndinochema, Ndofa asi m’kabatsiraO unzayi ruponeso, Nditoreyi ini     
CHORUSNditoreyi im’! Nditoreyi ini!Kristu wandifira ini, nditoreyi ini     
 Handinaka rubatsiro, Asi imwi mandifiraMungandi’te zvamunoda, Nditoreyi ini     
 Hapana zvandagadzira, Zvitsidzo zvangu ndotyoraAsi ndiponeseyiwo, Nditoreyi ini     
  Ndiri pamakumbo enyu, Ndiiteyi sezvamunodaPedzisayi basa renyu, Nditoreyi Tenzi     
 Kuti ndibate nesimba, Ndimutsirireyi mwoyoNdichaita kuda kwenyu, Nditoreyi Tenzi     
Kana basa razopera, Hondo yepasi yaperaNdinozokuchemerayi, Nditoreyi Tenzi

title: 290 Tinofara Kubatira Tenzi
content:
# 290 Tinofara Kubatira Tenzi

  Tinofara kubatira Tenzi, Tinobvuma kumubatiraBasa iro Tenzi anotipa, Tinoita nekutendeka     
CHORUSTomubatira, toenda mberiTine rufaro, TomubatiraPano mumunda wake     
 Tinofara kuparadza shoko, Nerudo kune vanhu pasiJesu arikupenya kwaBaba, Anotipa zvikomborero     
  Nekupfava totevera Tenzi, Tinofamba nekupereraTopangidza vamwe kuna Tenzi, Nevanyangadzi kugwayana

title: 291 Yakafanira Nyenye
content:
# 291 Yakafanira Nyenye

  Yakafanira nyenye,  Yakafanira nyenye;Yakafanira nyenye, Yabaiwa     
 CHORUSMbiri, Hariruya, Kudza Hariruya!Mbiri, Hariruya! Kunyenye.     
 Tenzi unza umambo! Huzopedza chitema;Unzai makore churu, Moyera.     
 Nguva dzese tinonzwa, Tim’de TimusandireTinosvika Zioni, Tim’one

title: 292 Mawoko Maviri
content:
# 292 Mawoko Maviri

  Ndichazo musevenzera JesuNdomutenda nemuromoNzeve dzangu dzichazomunzwaNdomuimbira neinzwi     
CHORUSTenzi tinouya,Tinouya tiri vanaTenzi tinouya,Tidzidze nemi     
 Ndichazofamba munzira yakeInoenda kudenga’yoMaziso kufunda BhaibheriNerudo rwake Kristu     
 Ndine mwoyo wekumupa JesuMweya umwe aponeseUpenyu humwe murusandoZvese zvangu ngezvakewo

title: 293 Gogo, Gogo
content:
# 293 Gogo, Gogo

  Gogo, gogo, ndiani? Arindira akanaka!Mufambi weumambo zve Asati awonekwaA! mweya wangu, zaruravo mwoyoChishamiso chipinde’mo mukati     
  Gogo, gogo, Achipo, Arindira, OshamisaHandinyore kuzarura, zvo zvite zvakurisaZvadzikisa midzi yazvo, Kutenderedzam’siwo; Kuti usazarure     
 Gogo, gogo, Achipo? Arindira, AkanakaAnogogodza musiwo, nechirembachemhinzwa; Arindira nemutsa, Tenziakarindira; Woreg’ aripo here

title: 294 Fukidzwa Neupenyu Hwake
content:
# 294 Fukidzwa Neupenyu Hwake

 Nangisa Jesu, Hana chitema;Upenyu hwake, hwapiwe’niUpenyu hwangu nechitema, Hwafukwa nehwake kuchena     
 CHORUSNdofukidzwa neupenyu hwakeNdozoziva upenyu hweseUpenyu hwangu hwechitemaHwafukwa nehwake huchena     
 Zvironda zvechitema zvadzama, Zvakatsvuka, Mweya unotyaO kufukidzwa nemwi Jesu, Ndosunungurwa nemutemo     
 Ndoda kuziva rusununguro! Jesu ondipa nguwo chenaNdaigashira, yangu ndarasa, Ndinopfeka upenyu hwenyu     
 Ndadzorerwa nerufo rwangu, Ndaruramiswa nemwi TenziNdaereswa neinzwi renyu, Ndozogashira mbiri yenyu

title: 295 Da’Dzira Hondo
content:
# 295 Da’Dzira Hondo

  Da’Dzira Hondo, mhandu yapetyo, Sim’dza mureza waTenziPfeka chishangu, Simbayi mese, Simbirayi painzwi rake     
CHORUSVakani simudzayi murezaGadzirira, nyeweranayiEnda mberi, Daidza Hosana!Kristu m’tungamiri wehondo     
 Farayi mukumbane nemhandu, Idi rinokurirazveChishangu nemureza zvipenye, Tichakurira, hatitadzi     
 O Mwari wevese chitinzwayi, Tibatsireyi netsitsi Hondo yazopera, takurira, Tingazopfekawo zviremba

title: 296 Nditungamire Muponesi
content:
# 296 Nditungamire Muponesi

  Tenzi nditungamire, Munzira yangu yoseNdachengetwa, ndinemwi, Ndichagara murudo     
 CHORUSTenzi, kuti ndisarasike m’nziraMukuchinja kwenguva, Nditungamire Tenzi     
 Muribako’ro rangu, Cham’pupuri chauyaHandizotyi ndinemwi, Ndinosimbira imwi     
 Ndisvitse kumagumo, Cham’pupuri chaperaNdozosvika nyika’yo, Masodzi opukutwa

title: 297 Zvakaroverwa Pamuchinjiko
content:
# 297 Zvakaroverwa Pamuchinjiko

  Kwava noumwe wakafa panzwimbo yangu, Kuti mweya sowang’ uponeWabvuma kufamba m’nzira yemuchinjiko, Kuti asunungure ini     
 CHORUSZvakaroverwa’po, Pam’chinjiko wakeO zvizhinji sey’ atakura!, Nekurwadzwa kose;Jesu atakura, zvese zvitema zvangu     
  Anemutsa, rudo, nenyasha kuneni, Anochenesa mwoyo wanguHandichina kuraswa, ngasununguka, Zvaroverwa pam’chinjiko     
 Ndichabatirira kuna muponesi, Ndichafara ndiri murwendoNdine rwiyo momwoyo nepamuromo, Zvitema zvangu zvazobviswa

title: 298 Handichina Nechangu, Zvese Ngezvenyu
content:
# 298 Handichina Nechangu, Zvese Ngezvenyu

  Inguva inorwadza, Zvakadini yeuromboApo ndati kuna Jesu, Zvese zvese ndezvanguHapana nechenyuba, Zvese zvese ndezvanguApo ndati kuna Jesu, Hapana nechenyuba     
Asi’ ye akandiwana, Ndakam’vona pamutiNemwoyo wangu ukati, Zvino zvimwe ndezvanguNezvimwevo ndezvako, Zvino zvimwe ndezvanguNemwoyo wangu ukati, Nezvimwe ndezvako     
  Misi yose mutsa wake, Unondibatsira, wondipfavisaNdichiti zvangu zvova zvishoma,  Zvako zvova zvizhinjiZvangu zvava zvishoma, Wondipfavisa ndichitiZvako zvava zvizhinji     
 Rudo rwenyu rwakakwira, Nekudzama kupindaNyanza nedenga zvino-ka, Handichina nechanguZvese zvazova zvenyu, Handichina nechanguZvese zvazova zvenyu, Tenzi rudo rwakurira

title: 299 Garai Makafara
content:
# 299 Garai Makafara

  Mwoyo yedu ngaifare, TinogununguneyiKana ivo Baba vedu, Vachingotichengeta?     
 CHORUSNgatifare, ngatifare, Tinovona kupenyaNzira yebasa yakanakisa, Kana tichifara     
 Apo achitungamira, Kana izvo zvitemaZvinozotikurirazve, Jesu anotibatsira     
 Kana tichirega basa, Tino rwadziwa mwoyoMumvuri unoswedera, Kuzodzinga rufaro     
  O! vatsvene vanogara, VachifarisisazveNzira yavo inopenya, Idayi zvakanaka

title: 300 Zororo Ravakaneta
content:
# 300 Zororo Ravakaneta

 Kune musha wevatsvene, Vozorora munyikaUko muponesi wangu, Akandigadzirira     
CHORUSKune zororo ikoko, kunezororo ikokoKune zororo ikoko, ravakanetaPamhendero yeJordani, Nemumunda weEdeniPanomuti weupenyu kunezororo     
 Andigadzirira imba, Inogara nariniKwandichazogara hangu, Kunyika iyo itsva     
Hakuzovi nekurwara, Hakunazve urombo Asi ndicha pfekedzwazve, Chiremba cheupenyu     
Hakuzovi norufu zve, Rumborera ruchabva,Vaponeswa vachafara kuna Jesu ouya.     
 Imbayi vadyi venhaka, Farai muchiendaMuchazozarurirwazve, Mazambara eZioni
